application.desc: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents
application.label: unknown

startPage=-1, endPage=-1, consolidateCitations=1, consolidateHeader=1, consolidateFunders=0, includeRawAffiliations=false, includeRawCitations=true, includeRawCopyrights=false, generateTeiIds=false, generateTeiCoordinates=[], flavor=null

div.p: Mtd is an enzyme of the methanogenic pathways isolated from Methanopyrus kandleri. Crystals obtained from MPD as precipatant adopted the space group C222 1 with unit cell parameters of 120 A, 151 A and 220 A for the native enzyme and 120 A, 151 A and 110 A for the selenomethionine labelled enzyme. We collected a native data set to 1.9 A resolution with an overall R sym value of 7.6%. Moreover, we measured a complete MAD experiments at the selenium edge to 2 A resolution with R sym values between 4.3 % and 7.6 %. The peak data set of a second crystals was measured. However, the selenium sites could not detected. Finally, we measured a high resolution data set of the selenomethionine-labelled enzyme crystals up to 1.5 A resolution with an R sym of 7.6%.

div.head: ATP sulfurylase
div.p: ATP sulfurylase is the final enzyme sulfide or sulfur oxidation to sulfate. Crystals from Allochromaticum vinosum obtained from sodium citrate had the space group P2 1 and the cell parameter were 73 A, 97 A, 73 A and 118°. A complete data set was collected with an R sym of 6.1% in the resolution range 30.0 -1.6 A.

div.head: 4-Hydroxybenzoyl-CoA reductase (4-OH)
div.p: 4-OH is involved in the anaerobic degradation of aromatic compounds. Crystals from Thauera aromatica grew in the space group P2 1 2 1 2 1 with cell parameters of 113 A, 115 A and 174 A. The resolution of the data was 1.65 A and their quality was excellent (R sym = 6.3 %).

div.head: ATP-binding subunit of the sulfate ABC transporter (CysA)
div.p: CysA is involved in the sulfate transport into the inner membrane of bacteria. CysA from Alicyclobacillus acidocaldarius was crystallized in the space group P2 1 with the cell parameters of 155 A, 56 A and 92 A. Native data up to 1.9 A resolution were collected. The R sym value was 5.8 %.

div.head: Formaldehyde-activating enzyme (FAE)
div.p: FAE is an enzyme of the methylotrophic pathway and converts formaldehyde to methylentetrahydromethanopterin. Crystals from Methylobacterium extorquens grew in the space group P4 x 2 x 2 with cell parameters of 120.8 A and 206.2 A. Native data were collected up to 1.9 A resolution; the Rsym was 5.4%.

div.head: γ γ γ γ-subunit of the sulfite reductase (DsvC)
div.p: Sulfite reductase is involved in sulfate reduction to sulfide, DsvC might playing a role by transporting electrons. DsvC from Archaeoglobus fulgidus was crystallized in the space group P2 1 2 1 2 1 , the cell parameters were 39.9 A, 46.5 A and 57.2 A. A complete data set was collected at 1.1 A resolution. The R sym value was 7.8 %.
